CapabilityLabel: Ability to prepopulate alert and logging data into tickets
Ability for analysts in different geographic locations to work simultaneously on an investigation
Ability to rank / score alerts so that analysts can easily prioritize alerts from most to least significant
Ability to automate common tasks such as responding to phishing attacks and failed user logins
Playbooks or workflows that are easy to create, configure, share, and combine
Ability to ingest custom logging / alert formats
